function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Firms avoid acknowledging the existence of the coronavirus","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading the virus within the firm and to customers","Mitigation":"Openly acknowledge the existence of the coronavirus and implement appropriate safety measures","Technologies":"Health monitoring technology, contact tracing apps","People":"Employees, customers","Owner":"Management, health and safety teams"},{"Description":"Inadequate protections for employees","Impact":"Increased risk of employees contracting the virus","Mitigation":"Implement frequent rotation of employees, provide greater access to handwashing stations","Technologies":"Employee rotation scheduling systems, hand hygiene monitoring systems","People":"Employees","Owner":"Human resources, health and safety teams"},{"Description":"Increased inventory levels due to anticipated higher demand for Rejectionist customers","Impact":"Potential waste of inventory if demand does not materialize","Mitigation":"Use sales promotions that do not encourage stockpiling, such as price-off or percent-off","Technologies":"Inventory management systems, sales promotion platforms","People":"Inventory managers, sales and marketing teams","Owner":"Sales and marketing teams"}]}
